meanings.definition: A type of agreement or contract formed by clicking a button or checking a box on a website.
meanings.sent1: The clickwrap was used to finalize the online purchase.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to read the clickwrap carefully before proceeding.
meanings.sent3: The clickwrap popped up just when I thought I was done shopping.
meanings.sent4: The clickwrap acted like a digital handshake between the user and the website.
meanings.sent5: The bright red clickwrap button stood out on the screen.

meanings.definition: The act of agreeing to terms and conditions by clicking a button or checking a box on a website.
meanings.sent1: After the clickwrap, the user gained access to the exclusive content.
meanings.sent2: She quickly completed the clickwrap to start her online course.
meanings.sent3: The clickwrap made him feel like he was signing a virtual contract.
meanings.sent4: Clicking the clickwrap felt like sealing a digital pact.
meanings.sent5: The clickwrap process was straightforward and user-friendly.
